param.name: THRESH
param.dialogReference:
Threshold

Floating point

Default: 2.000000

The values in the specified radius is used in the average calculation only if its difference with the central value is lesser or equal to this threshold.

tool.summary: Average 2 With Thereshold for Grids calculates average in X and Y distances unsing only the values that differ form central pixel less than a specified threshold. Each value has a weight which is inversely proportional to the distance (method 1).
